subject: Heisman Trophy
Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mr. Blanchard, a Heisman Trophy winner, teamed up with Glenn Davis on the unbeaten Army teams of the mid-1940s in college football’s most storied backfield pairing.
snippet: Mr. Blanchard, a Heisman Trophy winner, teamed up with Glenn Davis on the unbeaten Army teams of the mid-1940s in college football’s most storied backfield pairing.
